participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, often finds solace in social media but struggles with self-esteem.
participant_1.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and playful, enjoys engaging in creative activities and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i like donuts. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.

content.text: Hey! Are you overweight and unhappy? Because I am.
